section.title: openedx.core.djangoapps.content_tagging.rest_api.v1.filters module
section.paragraph: API Filters for content tagging org

desc_content.paragraph: Bases: BaseFilterBackend
Filter for ObjectTagViewSet to only show taxonomies that the user can view.
Return a filtered queryset.
Bases: BaseFilterBackend
Filter taxonomies based on user’s orgs roles
Taxonomy admin can see all taxonomies Org staff can see all taxonomies from their orgs Content creators and instructors can see enabled taxonomies avaliable to their orgs
Return a filtered queryset.

section.title: openedx.core.djangoapps.content_tagging.rest_api.v1.serializers module
section.paragraph: API Serializers for content tagging org

desc_content.paragraph: Bases: ObjectTagMinimalSerializer
Serializer for Object Tags.
This override get_can_delete_objecttag to avoid delete object tags if is copied.
Verify if the user can delete the object tag.
Override to return False if the object tag is copied.
Bases: TaxonomyListQueryParamsSerializer
Serializer for the query params for the GET view
Validate the serializer data
Bases: TaxonomySerializer
Serializer for Taxonomy objects inclusing the associated orgs
Bases: object
alias of Taxonomy
Return True if the taxonomy is associated with all orgs.
Return the list of orgs for the taxonomy.
Bases: Serializer
Serializer for the body params for the update orgs action
Validate the serializer data
Bases: APIView
” View to export a CSV with all children and tags for a given course/context.
Export a CSV with all children and tags for a given course/context.
Bases: ObjectTagView

View to create and retrieve ObjectTags for a provided Object ID (object_id). This view extends the ObjectTagView to add Organization filters for the results, and fires events when the tags are updated.
Refer to ObjectTagView docstring for usage details.
alias of ObjectTagCopiedMinimalSerializer
Extend the update method to fire CONTENT_OBJECT_ASSOCIATIONS_CHANGED event
Bases: TaxonomyView
View to list, create, retrieve, update, delete, export or import Taxonomies. This view extends the TaxonomyView to add Organization filters.
Refer to TaxonomyView docstring for usage details.

definition.paragraph: GET api/content_tagging/v1/taxonomies?org=orgA - Get all taxonomies for organization A GET api/content_tagging/v1/taxonomies?org=orgA&enabled=true - Get all enabled taxonomies for organization A

desc_content.paragraph: Creates a new taxonomy with the given orgs and imports the tags from the uploaded file.
Return a list of taxonomies.
Returns all taxonomies by default. If you want the disabled taxonomies, pass enabled=False. If you want the enabled taxonomies, pass enabled=True.
Update the orgs associated with taxonomies.
Create a new taxonomy.
alias of TaxonomyOrgSerializer
